summary: High quality, scratch-made texture replacers for Isilmeriel's excellent LOTR weapons mod.
descriptionHtml:
First of all, you'll need to have Isilmeriel's excellent LOTR weapons pack installed and install these texture/mesh files on top of that. Get it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5727]here[/url]!

This mod will be updated with new textures as I feel making them, so I recommend tracking it!
--

Changelog:

7th February '13 - Legolas's bow & dagger
5th February '13 - Bugfixes, tweaks & Sauron Mace.
19th January '13 - Glamdring
11th January '13 - Narsil/Anduril
10th January '13 - Witch-King of Angmar's sword
9th January '13 - Sting/Spiderbane

--
Please ask Millenia and Isil for explicit permission if you want to reuse/edit/redistribute these files in any way.
author: Team Isillenia
